b: ^ Finally, the underground forest! If the legends are true, I'm just steps away from the artifact!
^ I... I must obtain this artifact at all costs!

Encounter1: ^Well, knight... Are you attempting to plunder my Dungeon?
^Of course, Dragon. It's my objective, and you can't stop me.
^And what makes my treasure so valuable to you?
^Among your treasure there is a magical book known to contain divine knowledge... I want to seize it.
^Hmm... Interesting. Let's see if you are worthy of it, knight!
^Let's fight, and you'll explain to me what you intend to do with it.
Encounter2: ^I... I must obtain this artifact at all costs!
^Always motivated to plunder my Dungeon, I see...
^I can't afford to make mistakes, Dragon. I've sacrificed too much to get here; I must retrieve this book!
^It's the only way to see my family again. The gods' books must contain a way to escape death!
^Hmm... I see... But whatever the contents of this book, you'll have to get through me before to read it!
